rescue_process.title: Path of Rescue
rescue_process.subtitle: We are not just a shelter, but a rehabilitation center. Every cat goes through a thorough path before entering the common room.

1.title: Rescue
1.desc: Our wards come to us in different ways: we pick them up from the street, evacuate them from combat zones, or accept them from caring people who found an animal in trouble.

2.title: Medical Checkup
2.desc: The first step is a visit to the clinic. We do a full checkup: blood biochemistry, ultrasound, doctor's examination, and express tests for viruses (FIV, Leukemia, Panleukopenia).

3.title: Quarantine & Records
3.desc: The cat settles in a cozy quarantine box under supervision. We create a passport and enter all data into our accounting system to record health history.

4.title: Treatment & Vaccination
4.desc: After adaptation, we carry out parasite treatment. Next is complex vaccination with the best preparations (Purevax, Nobivac). All data is entered into the passport.

rescue_process.info_text: We follow strict safety protocols. No cat gets to others without confirmed health. Professional help in treatment and examination is provided by the wonderful team of <0>"Shanty"</0> clinic. This guarantees safety for both our wards and Meowroom guests.
rescue_process.nutrition_title: Nutrition is the Key to Health
rescue_process.nutrition_text: We do not save on food. Our cats eat exclusively grain-free super-premium food from our partner Josera. This ensures strong immunity, healthy fur, and energy for games.

reports.title: Transparency & Reports
reports.subtitle: See exactly how your donations help cats. We cover operational costs ourselves, so 100% of your donation goes to the animals.
reports.no_data: No reports found for this period.

hero.title: Meowroom Charity Shelter & Cat Anticafe
hero.subtitle: A cozy home where our cats live in love and safety. Come to meet our furry friends or take them under your care.

animals.q: Can I bring my own animals?
animals.a: Unfortunately, no. Cats live here, and this is their home. The appearance of other animals can cause them stress or conflict. We care about the safety and peace of our wards.

booking.q: Do I need to book in advance?
booking.a: Yes, we recommend booking in advance, especially on weekends. This guarantees that there will be a free place for you and you can spend time comfortably.

adopt.q: Can I take a cat home?
adopt.a: At the moment, we do not give cats for adoption. However, you can become a guardian (patron) for any cat. This allows you to support them financially, visit them, and receive updates about their life.

price.q: What is the cost of a visit?
price.a: We operate as an anticafe. You pay for the time spent: 1 hour — 250 UAH, 2 hours — 400 UAH. Tea, coffee, cookies, and board games are included.

vaccination.q: Are all your cats healthy and vaccinated?
vaccination.a: Yes, absolutely! All our wards undergo a full veterinary examination, are tested for viral infections (FIV, Leukemia, Panleukopenia), and are necessarily vaccinated with Purevax and Nobivac. They are also regularly treated for parasites.

feeding.q: What do cats eat at Meowroom?
feeding.a: The health of our wards is our priority, so we chose the best nutrition. All cats eat exclusively grain-free super-premium food from the German manufacturer <0>Josera</0>. This provides them with the necessary energy and strong immunity.

about.title: About Us
about.story_1: Hello friends! We are an ordinary family from Kharkiv with a passion for cats. But with the start of the war, our world changed. We couldn't remain indifferent to the disasters they are experiencing.
about.story_2: Today, hundreds of homeless animals are on the streets of our city looking for love and care. We couldn't stay indifferent and started to act. We feed street cats, rescue them from terrible situations, provide medical care, and give them a HOME.
about.story_3: We founded the charity fund "BlueCross for Cats" and opened a home for cats - Meowroom, where they find shelter, warmth, and a loving family. We care for over 60 tails! This is a real home where they feel good. They are loved and cared for, have water, tasty healthy food, and toys for entertainment.
about.story_4: We really hope and count on the help of all caring people! Only together can we help our four-legged friends. And they will demonstrate their gratitude with purring. We really need your help and support.
about.quote: "We become responsible, forever, for what we have tamed."
about.josera_desc: For 4 years now, Josera has been helping our shelter. Every month they provide 100 kg of high-quality holistic food for our cats.

services.title: How does it work?
services.description: First and foremost, we are a <0>shelter</0>, and only secondly, we are an <1>anticafe</1>. The cats' peace of mind is most important to us. Your payment goes to support the cats in the shelter.

urgent.label: Urgent Fundraising
urgent.copy_hint: Click on card number to copy

about_section.title: What is Meowroom?
about_section.text_1: "Meowroom" is a unique space in Kharkiv combining the format of an <0>anticafe</0> and a shelter. It's not a regular cafe: we have no kitchen or menu. You only pay for the time spent, enjoying the company of cats.
about_section.text_2: Meowroom has become a real home for rescued cats. Here they live in safety and love. You can come to us to communicate with furry friends, and if you wish, take one of them under your care.
about_section.text_3: Our mission is not just to rescue animals, but also to cultivate a culture of humane treatment towards them. Every visit to Meowroom is a contribution to saving a life, as all funds go towards the care and treatment of our wards.

booking.title: Booking at Meowroom
booking.subtitle: Choose a time and come visit the cats
booking.no_slots: No available slots for this day
booking.terms: By clicking the button, you agree to the visit rules
booking.success_msg: Thank you, {{name}}! Your request has been received.

home.title: Cozy Home
home.desc: A safe space where cats live in love and care, surrounded by the attention of our guests.

health.title: Health & Safety
health.desc: All our wards are healthy, vaccinated, sterilized, and have veterinary passports.

charity.title: Charity
charity.desc: We work together with the "BlueCross for Cats" foundation. All funds go to help animals.

donation_preview.title: Help Us Save Lives
donation_preview.text: "Meowroom" exists thanks to your visits and voluntary donations. Every hryvnia turns into food, medicine, and warmth for our wards.

cats.title: Our Cats
cats.subtitle: Here they found a loving family and a warm home. Meet them and find your favorite to become their friend and guardian.
cats.empty: Unfortunately, no cats found for your request.

visit.title: Visit Meowroom
visit.subtitle: Spend time in the coziest company in Kharkiv.

info.title: Important Format Information
info.text: We operate as a <0>shelter-anticafe</0>. This means we have no kitchen, chefs, or food menu. You pay for the time spent in the company of cats. You can read, play board games, work, or just relax.

pricing.title: Visit Cost
pricing.note: * All funds raised go to purchase food, litter, pay for veterinary services, and ensure a comfortable life for our wards.
pricing.book_note: It's quick and convenient. Please book at least one day before your planned visit

rules.title: Visit Rules
rules.intro: Meowroom is not a petting zoo. It is a home for cats and cats set their own rules. Remember that when you come to them, you are visiting them.

list.1: Entry for children under 12 is prohibited, from 12 to 14 years old - only with parents.
list.2: You must enter the premises without street shoes (you can wear rubber slippers or shoe covers, or bring your own indoor shoes).
list.3: Be sure to wash your hands before interacting with the animals.
list.4: Smoking and drinking alcohol is not allowed.
list.5: Watch your children so they do not offend the animals.
list.6: You cannot bring, eat, or give your own food to the cats.
list.7: You cannot pick up cats (unless the cat comes to you itself), and you cannot hold them against their will.
list.8: Do not wake the cat, do not pull the tail, do not disturb while eating.
list.9: Do not shout in the room (cats are afraid of loud sounds).
list.10: Photography is allowed, but without flash.
list.11: You cannot bring other animals with you.
list.12: We ask you not to smoke before visiting the cat cafe (cats are very sensitive to smells).
list.13: Please wear comfortable, inexpensive clothing (cats may jump, make a snag, leave fur on your clothes).

rules.outro: Cats are the owners, and you are their guests! Please remember this.
rules.disclaimer: The administration of the cat club reserves the right to ask you to leave the premises if our rules are not followed.

1.name: Maria K.
1.text: Wonderful place! The cats are so friendly and well-cared for. The atmosphere is very relaxing. I highly recommend visiting to recharge with positive energy!

2.name: Oleksandr P.
2.text: A great initiative to help homeless animals. You can feel the love and care here. It's clean, cozy, and the staff is very friendly.

3.name: Iryna S.
3.text: The best place for cat lovers in Kharkiv! Delicious coffee, board games, and most importantly - purring therapists. I will definitely come back!

donate.title: Support Meowroom
donate.subtitle: Your help saves lives and gives cats hope.

urgent.title: For Jordan's Surgery
urgent.desc: The surgery to remove the air rifle bullet from the nasal cavity was successful, Jordan is already recovering! Now we need to cover the debt to the clinic for his rescue.

sponsor.title: Become Our Partner
sponsor.text: We are looking for a general sponsor to create a full-fledged rehabilitation center. Learn more about our project.

block.title: Help the Shelter
block.subtitle: Your support ensures warmth, comfort, and care for each of our wards

expenses.title: Where does the money go?
expenses.utilities_desc: Electricity, gas, water — maintaining warmth and comfort for cats.
expenses.litter_desc: Every month we need over 100 kg of litter.

stuff.title: Bring Things
stuff.desc: We always need: wet wipes for cleaning, garbage bags with handles (40l), litter boxes and quality bowls, scratchers, beds, treats, and toys. Wet food Royal Canin: Recovery, Gastrointestinal, Babycat.

volunteer.title: Become a Volunteer
volunteer.desc: Come help with cleaning (cleanliness of the shelter is the key to cats' health) or photography for advertising the shelter in social networks and mass media to promote the project.

guardian.title: Become a Guardian
guardian.desc: Take a cat under your care. Your support will provide a friend with everything necessary: litter, treats, and care, and you can visit your ward and follow their success.

hero.title: Become a Partner of the Future
hero.text: We are looking for a general sponsor to create a full-fledged animal rehabilitation and adoption center of European level in Kharkiv.

vision.title: Our Dream and Goal
vision.text: "Meowroom" aims to become not just a shelter, but a large-scale social project. We want to create a space where care for animals intertwines with support for people and public education.

integration.title: Social Integration
integration.desc: Creating jobs for people with disabilities, providing them with decent work and socialization within our project.

clinic.title: Own Vet Clinic
clinic.desc: Modern veterinary cabinet with a full range of equipment for timely and high-quality treatment of our wards.

culture.title: Culture and Education
culture.desc: Educational work: we bring to the masses the culture of humane and responsible treatment of domestic animals.

pr.title: Image and PR
pr.desc: Mention in all media, logo on the building facade and all project resources. Status of general partner of a socially significant project.

csr.title: CSR Programs
csr.desc: Implementation of your company's corporate social responsibility strategy. Volunteer days for employees.

future.title: Contribution to Future
future.desc: Opportunity to leave a mark in the city's history by creating a unique object that will serve people and animals for many years.

contact.title: Ready to Discuss Cooperation?
contact.text: We are open to dialogue and ready to present a detailed business plan and development concept. Contact us directly.

footer.about: A unique space in Kharkiv combining the format of "Cat Cafe" and a shelter for cats. Find your furry friend or just spend time in cozy company.
footer.copyright: Meowroom & BlueCross for Cats. All rights reserved.

adoption.title: Become a friend to {{name}}
adoption.subtitle: Choose how you want to help this wonderful cat

form.name: Your Name
form.success: Thank you! We received your request and will contact you shortly.

info.adopt_desc: We are very happy you want to give a home! The adoption process includes an interview and signing a contract.
info.guardian_desc: Guardianship is a monthly financial support for the cat (food, litter). You can visit them and receive photo updates.
